description.en: Explore the personal website of Qingqi Shi, a software engineer who values the craftsman's spirit and specializes in React, TypeScript, and web development. Discover his professional experiences, technical skills, and educational background.
description.zh: 探索石清琪的个人网站，他是一位信奉匠人精神并擅长 React、TypeScript 和 Web 开发的软件工程师。了解他的职业经历、技术技能和教育背景。

brief.en: Embracing the craftsman's spirit, I pursue perfection, precision and patience in software engineering and all aspects of life.
brief.zh: 我信奉工匠精神。工匠用他们敬业、专注和精益求精的精神雕琢产品。无论是工作还是生活，我都这样要求自己。
